import React from 'react' import './Header.css' import SearchIcon from '@mui/iconsstart-material/Search' import ShoppingBasketIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ShoppingBasket" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useStateValue } from "../StateProvider"; import { Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; export default function Header() { const [{ basket }, dispatch] = useStateValue(); return (
Hello Sign In
Returns & Orders
Your Prime
{basket?.length}
) }
